# ADR-XXX: <Decision Title>

> Repeatable file template — copy into `docs/project/decisions/ADR-XXX.md` when you record a new decision.

- **Status:** Proposed / Accepted / Superseded
- **Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
- **Deciders:** Roles or names
- **Related Docs:** design/spec/implementation references, TBD IDs

## Context

- Background leading to the decision, including constraints and goals.

## Decision

- The choice made. Be explicit and unambiguous.

## Consequences

- Positive outcomes.
- Negative outcomes or trade-offs.

## Implementation Notes

- Immediate actions required (code, docs, follow-up tasks).

## Alternatives Considered

- Option A – why rejected.
- Option B – ...

## Revision History

- YYYY-MM-DD – Status change or clarifications.
